text: Captain Daja Brel commands the [[Guardians of the Gate]], and her family has served with the unit since it was first formed. Daja firmly believes that the Guardians are all that stands between order and chaos in [[Sharn]], and she acts with unbridled force if she believes a group or an individual threatens the city.
title: Daja Brel
tags: [[Sharn Watch]] [[Guardians of the Gate]] human humanoid Sharn
